dmca.title: Copyright Infringement Notification - cutiecentral.com FA-R293
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Richard Kawasaki [mailto:richardk@baytsp.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 19, 2004 7:21 PM
To: hostmaster@globat.com; abuse@mzima.net; support@cutiecentral.com;
webmaster@imageshack.us; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: feinarts@aol.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement Notification - cutiecentral.com FA-R293

 

Dear Sirs: 
We would like to request that the subsciber responsible for the
infringements below be banned from using your site, in order to ensure that
such egregious violations of copyright law are not repeated. Thank you for
your cooperation.

Robert Fein Photography/Fein Arts Internet has authorized BayTSP.com to act
as its agent for copyright infringement notification. The spidering of the
Web has detected infringements on your website as detailed in the report
below. Therefore, this letter is an official notification under the
provisions of section 512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to
effect removal of the detected infringements listed in the attached report.
The Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works, the
Universal Copyright Convention, as well as bilateral treaties with other
countries allow for protection of our client's images even beyond US
borders. The documentation below specifies the exact location of the
infringement. The BayFile ID identifies our images by shoot number. We
hereby request that you immediately remove the offending material, as
specified in RFC 1036, and refrain from using our client's materials in the
future. 

BayTSP.com has a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of in the attached report, is not authorized by Robert Fein
Photography/Fein Arts Internet, its agent, or the law. The information
provided herein is accurate to the best of our knowledge. 

BayTSP.com hereby swears under penalty of perjury that BayTSP.com is
authorized to act on behalf of Robert Fein Photography/Fein Arts Internet
for matters pertaining to notification of infringement of its exclusive
rights in its copyrighted material. 

Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to
resolve this matter. Please reference BayTSP Notification ID in your
response. 

Sincerely,
Richard Kawasaki
Compliance Manager
BayTSP.com
PO Box 1314
Los Gatos, CA 95031-1314
(408) 341-2300
dmca@baytsp.com 

 

Thread: 
http://www.cutiecentral.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=921
